mapper.select: SELECT A.TEAM_JOIN_REQUEST_SEQ /* 팀가입요청SEQ */ , A.JOIN_REQUEST_TYPE_CODE /* 팀가입요청유형코드 */ , A.JOIN_REQUEST_STATE_CODE /* 팀가입요청상태코드 */ , A.REQUEST_DATE /* 가입요청일시 */ , B.TEAM_NAME /* 팀명 */ , B.HOMETOWN /* 연고지 */ , B.FOUNDATION_YMD /* 창립일자 */ , C.NAME AS LEADER_NAME /* 팀장이름 */ FROM TEAM_JOIN_REQUEST A INNER JOIN TEAM B ON A.TEAM_SEQ = B.TEAM_SEQ INNER JOIN USER C ON B.LEADER_USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND A.JOIN_REQUEST_TYPE_CODE = #{joinRequestTypeCode}
